string.value: In order to make a bigger saddle, you need to obtain some #t4032477#, a specialty product of #m251000000#. You should ask #b#p2092001##k, who is in charge of trade in #b#m251000000##k.

The #t4032497#, the master artisan who makes the #t4032477#, has been kidnapped by the Red-Nose Pirates. If you want some #t4032477#, you'll have to rescue #t4032497# first... Enter the Pirate Hideout to rescue the #t4032497#. You can enter from the #b#m251010403##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032497# #t4032497# #b#c4032497# / 1#k
You rescued the #t4032497#. All you have to do now is ask the #t4032497# to make you some #t4032477#.

What can I do for you? If you're looking purchase herbs, you can't right now becuase of the Red-Nosed Pirates... Huh? You're looking for #t4032477#? Unfortunately, you can't get them here anymore because of the Red-Nosed Pirates!

There was a master artisan known as the #b#t4032497##K in #m251000000#. The porcelain he used had a mysterious power that allowed it never to break. That porcelain also made it so herbs never spoiled. His skills were so amazing that the Red-Nosed Pirates kidnapped the #b#t4032497##K.

Since then, the herbs spoil easily and the only porcelain we have left are these strange ones in which odd organisms grow. There is no more #t4032477#. If you want one, you'll have to enter the Red-Nosed Pirate hideout and rescue the #t4032497#... Can you do it?

I'm sorry, I didn't realize what a great adventurer you were! Please rescue the #t4032497#. The #t4032497# should be inside the #b#m251010403# storage#k, where the Red-Nosed Pirates hold all the treasures that they have stolen.
Enter carefully and rescue the #t4032497#. If you can do it, all of #m251000000# will thank you.
I guess I was expecting too much... How will we ever rescue the #t4032497#...
Oh wow, you rescued the #t4032497#! Is the #t4032497# all right? Let me take a look at him.
Whew... Luckily, he's only passed out. Than again, even the Red-Nosed Pirates wouldn't have hurt such a skilled artisan... Now the #t4032497# should be able to make you the #t4032477# you need.
You couldn't rescue the #b#t4032497##k? It figures... The Red-Nosed Pirates are such a tenacious bunch...
